VolumeMaster.AddVolume_PlantCode: Select the plant (code) from the dropdown.
VolumeMaster.AddVolume_CustomerCode: Select the customer (code) from the dropdown.
VolumeMaster.AddVolume_Vendor_container: Select the vendor (code) from the dropdown.
VolumeMaster.AddVolume_Button: Click here to add the vendor code.
VolumeMaster.AddVolume_PartType: Select the part type from the dropdown.
VolumeMaster.AddVolume_PartNumber: Select the part no. (revision no.) from the dropdown.
